question: When {name} watches her {family}, she gets out a variety of toys for him. The bag of building blocks has {x} blocks in it. The bin of stuffed animals has {y} stuffed animals inside. The number of action figures in the action figure pack is twice the number of blocks and stuffed animals combined. The crayon box has 12 different colors of crayon. The tower of stacking rings has {z} multicolored rings on it. {name} recently bought a tube of bouncy balls, bringing her total number of toys for her {family} up to {total}. How many bouncy balls came in the tube?
